snippet: The government lost nearly $34 billion in royalties by selling private companies concessions at negotiated prices rather than auctioning them, according to an audit.
lead_paragraph: The government lost nearly $34 billion in royalties by selling private companies concessions at negotiated prices rather than auctioning them, according to an audit.

headline.seo: Indian Government’s Policy on Coal Concessions Is Faulted
headline.main: Report Faults Indian Government’s Handling of Coal Concessions
headline.print_headline: Report Faults Indian Government’s Handling of Coal Concessions
